casebody.data:
Petru GIURA, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
SAINT CLAIR DISPOSAL, INC., and Jamie Leonard Pouliot, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 158209
COA: 342070 Supreme Court of Michigan. December 21, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the June 28, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.

BERNSTEIN, J., did not participate because he has a family member with an interest that could be affected by the proceeding.
